TopicTitle: Kim Stanley Robinson's Red Mars to be made into a TV series.

Articles.Content:
Source:

http://variety.com/2015/tv/news/red-mars-spike-series-order-1201656112/

I'm more than a little happy to see this happening, and to be written and produced by JMS as well!

In my opinion, Robinson made writing Mars fiction 10 times more difficult for subsequent authors because he did it so darned well and in such detail. This, if done with respect for the original material (whilst not necessarily being beholden to it), could be an astonishing bit of television.

 

Roll on January 2017!
